snippet.title: CLIMB Ranked in TETR.IO - TIPS for TETRA LEAGUE Improvement
snippet.description:
Tetr.io is a very cool game. The ranked system is done well and the rating is a good reflection of a players skill. There are many hidden mechanics in this game that are different from other Tetris games which go overlooked by the majority of the playerbase. In this video, I'm gonna go over some ranked system quirks along with unique gameplay mechanics like multiplier combos and b2b chaining, along with tips for how to use them, all relevant to getting good at this new game and climbing the ranks.

go watch my twitch at https://www.twitch.tv/garbocan_/ . I stream every day at 7PM PST.

Also, link to the discord  http://fourwi.de/ . I'm very active there so if you ever want to talk to me that's probably the best way.

Want Tetris coaching? I offer private 1 on 1 coaching at https://www.fiverr.com/share/8zPPkE . I have lots of experience teaching Tetris so it's definitely worth looking at if you want a more personal learning experience.

oh also follow my twitter over at https://twitter.com/garbocan_

Use the tips, strategies and techniques in this video to get better at tetr.io. If you're still looking for more videos about getting good at tetris, check out my channel where I talk about a variety of topics such as t spins, beginner tips, dt cannons and more.

Thanks for watching.
